name: Card Attack KAIJU
description:
Card Attack KAIJU is a fast-paced arcade deckbuilder where you as the KAIJU rampaging through the City take on a series of escalating battles against Human forces. With each battle, your KAIJU grows using Adaptations that modify Cards in their Deck but also Chaos will rise bringing stronger Human forces into the fray. These culminate in a showdown for the fate of the planet pitting your KAIJU against humanity's Ultimate Weapon in a clash of titanic proportions!

CREDITS

  • Swarnava Banerjee - Designer + Front-End Coder
  • Isiah Brighton - Back-End Coder
  • Victor B. Thomas  - Illustrator
  • David Jones - Pixel Artist

Plugins used made by Cutievirus, SumRndmDde, Yanfly, Himeworks, biud436, Isiah Brighton, Galv, Fallen Angel Olivia, Caethyril, Eliaquim, Zevia.

Some Visual and Audio Assets from Degica and Game-Icons.net.  SFX from Degica. BGM from Open Game Art (specific artist credits in-game).

Card Attack KAIJU was made using in RPG Maker MV with the help of the Card Game Combat plugin (among many others). We hope that this game will inspire others to try to make their own games using this tool as well!
